summary: In a period when many thought that "the only good Indian is a dead Indian," Chief Joseph and the Nez Perce won the admiration of the American public.
cast: James Whitmore|Sam Elliott|Ned Romero|Linda Redfearn|Emilio Delgado|John Kauffman|Nick Ramus|Frank Salsedo|Vincent St. Cyr|Charles Ynfante|Conrad Hool
title: Indios
